i1.blurb: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Evelynn''' gains ''Demon Shade'' after not taking damage from enemy champions or turrets for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, or after 4 seconds of [[basic attack]]ing or casting an ability.

{{sbc|Demon Shade:}} While below {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|250 to 590}} {{as|(+ 250% AP)}} health}}}}, '''Evelynn''' {{sti|healing|restores}} {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|15 to 75}} health}}}} every second. From level 6 onward, ''Demon Shade'' also grants {{tip|camouflage}}.
i1.name: Demon Shade
notes: * {{sbc|Lore:}} '''Evelynn''' has no need of disguises while she's invisible.
* Whenever ''Demon Shade'' activates a puff of purple smoke will trigger and a grey circle will appear around ''Evelynn'' and then she will start running differently.
* Whenever ''Evelynn'' approaches a visible enemy champion an eye will appear above them (only visible to her). This eye will change colors depending on how close ''Evelynn'' is to them.
** {{as|Yellow|energy}} means she is about to be spotted.
** {{as|Red|hp}} means she has been.
* When spotted, an exclamation mark will appear above ''Evelynn'' (only visible to her and her allies).
** ''Evelynn'' will not be spotted if the enemy doesn't have line of sight of her (e.g behind a turret or in the [[Sight|fog of war]]).
** She will be spotted by an enemy she has no sight of but ''Demon Shade's'' stealth will not break.
* The following can break ''Demon Shade's'' stealth:
** Certain [[summoner spell]]s ({{si|Exhaust}}, {{si|Heal}}, {{si|Ignite}}, {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Smite}}, {{si|Teleport}}).

** ''Evelynn'' herself capturing a neutral or enemy altar in {{tip|Twisted Treeline}} ({{as|red|hp}} eye for neutral and {{as|yellow|energy}} one for enemy but nevertheless she will be seen by enemies).

q1.blurb: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
q1.customlabel: {{tt|Barrage Cooldown|The cooldown in between each spike cast. Is affected by cooldown reduction.}}
description: {{sbc|Dart:}} '''Evelynn''' flourishes her lashers, launching a dart in the target direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy hit. Hitting a {{tip|monster}} refunds {{sti|cdr|60%}} of the cooldown.
For the next 4 seconds, the enemy hit takes {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} from her next 3 [[basic attack]]s or abilities.
''Hate Spike'' may be re-activated up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

{{sbc|Spikes:}} '''Evelynn''' projects a line of spikes in the direction of her attack target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck. ''Hate Spike'' will first prioritize '''Evelynn's''' attack target, then the nearest enemy champion.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*3 to 50*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
{{st|Spike Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|25*3 to 45*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|25*4+10*3 to 45*4+50*3}} {{as|(+ 195% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Hate Spike
notes: * ''Hate Spike'' prioritizes:
*# The last champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The last non-champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The lowest-health champion
*# The lowest-health non-champion
* Recasts can be buffered up to {{fd|0.5}} seconds before becoming castable.

* '''Evelynn''' has a minimum of 4 seconds to use the second casts regardless of the ability's cooldown, which is mainly only applicable versus monsters, on {{tip|Ultra Rapid Fire}} and in Training Mode.
* The ''Dart'' will apply {{tip|Single target}} effects, while the ''Spikes'' will apply {{tip|AoE}} effects.
* In {{tip|URF}} game mode, the spikes can be reactivated 10 times instead.

w1.blurb: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' ''curses'' the target champion or monster for 5 seconds.
'''Evelynn's''' next basic attack or ability against the ''accursed'' ''expunges'' them, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 65%.

''Expunging'' a target will refund ''Allure's'' {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}}. If the target is ''cursed'' for at least {{fd|2.5}} seconds she also {{tip|charm|charms}} them, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

Against {{tip|champions}}, the ''expunge'' also {{sti|magic penetration|reduces}} their {{as|magic resistance}} for 4 seconds.
Against {{tip|monsters}}, the ''expunge'' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and the {{tip|charm}} lasts for 2 more seconds.
leveling: {{st|Magic Resistance Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|magic resistance}}}}{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|250 to 450}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Allure
notes: * After {{fd|2.5}} seconds, the target sees an indicator that points toward her.
* The magic resistance shred will be applied to the attack or ability that procs it.

e1.blurb: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' whips the target enemy with her lashers, applying [[on-hit effects]] and dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
'''Evelynn''' also gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
Gaining {{ai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}} resets ''Whiplash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} and {{ai|Empowered Whiplash|Evelynn|empowers}} the next cast.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|55 to 115}} {{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e1.name: Whiplash
notes: * ''Whiplash'' applies both {{tip|single target}} and {{tip|on-hit}} effects.

** The damage dealt by the ability itself is classified as ability damage, and will not apply [[life steal]]. Effects such as the on-hit physical damage from {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}} will apply life steal to its own damage when inflicted by ''Whiplash''.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} toward the target enemy, dealing increased damage as well as damaging all enemies she passes through. ''On-hit effects are only applied to her target.''
''The {{as|percent health}} ratio deals a minimum of 25 damage and is capped at 450 against monsters.''
leveling: {{st|Empowered Damage|{{ap|75 to 175}} {{as|(+ 4% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e2.name: Empowered Whiplash
notes: * ''Empowered Whiplash'' applies {{tip|AoE}} effects to secondary targets, but still applies {{tip|single target}} effects to her target.
* There is no time-out period on ''Empowered Whiplash''.

r1.blurb: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her, before {{tip|blink|blinking}} back 700 units.
Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking {{as|magic damage}}, doubled against enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 375}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Empowered Damage|{{ap|125*2 to 375*2}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Last Caress
notes: * ''Last Caress'' can be buffered during {{ai|Empowered Whiplash|Evelynn}}.
* The casting input controls the direction the damage is dealt, with the movement automatically happening in the reverse direction. This is comparable to {{ai|90 Caliber Net|Caitlyn}}.
* Enemies below the bonus damage threshold are marked with a giant pink kiss, but this does not indicate whether they are within the kill threshold.
